name: SW3SGGTIMFTPSIP (some weird 3 second gameplay game that i made for the polymars seajam in powerpoint)
name_original: SW3SGGTIMFTPSIP (some weird 3 second gameplay game that i made for the polymars seajam in powerpoint)
description:
hi uwu

this game is veri veri short

just a game of getting trash with a boat

INSTRUCTIONS

just download the .rar unzip it and then open the directory called "fixedsys-excelsior-301-cufonfonts" after open "FSEX300" Install the font and then go back to the data directory and open gud game.ppt to open the game

BUG REPORT

if u are in the controls screen and u are presssing  continue and the button dosent work just open the file called "Start" to force the game 2 open

if u are trying to move the boat and it doesnt work just open the data directory select "Start.ppsm" and select modify (or edit) then press "Enable Active Content" and after press "Enable Edit". Then press ctrl + G to save and then close with alt + f4 and after open "Start" to open the game

Thanks uwu
